item.title: 无人机警报后俄罗斯黑海主要油港暂停装货
item.description: 俄罗斯黑海沿岸的两个重要油港在一夜之间收到无人机袭击警告后停止了油轮装载。【原文：Two key oil ports on Russia’s Black Sea coast halted loading of tankers after overnight warnings of drone attacks.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划 "接受 "2026 年战争开支预算赤字
item.description: 俄罗斯计划连续第五年出现预算赤字，因为在克里姆林宫发动乌克兰战争的背景下，收入减少和支出增加继续给政府财政造成压力。【原文：Russia plans to run a budget deficit for a fifth year as declining revenue and increased spending continue to put pressure on the government’s finances amid the Kremlin’s war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 瑞典央行董事会候选人包括经济学家和养老金主管
item.description: 瑞典央行开始物色新的副行长，以接替即将离任的安娜-布雷曼，银行经济学家、养老基金负责人和雇主组织负责人被视为潜在人选。【原文：Sweden’s central bank started its hunt for a new deputy governor to replace the outgoing Anna Breman, with bank economists, a pension fund chief and the head of an employers’ organization seen as potential picks.】

item.title: 甲骨文为何在拟议的 TikTok 交易中扮演主角
item.description: 美国和中国正逐步达成一项协议，以解决 TikTok 在美国的未来问题，而甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp.【原文：The US and China are edging toward a deal to resolve the future of TikTok in the US, with Oracle Corp. cast in a starring role.】

item.title: 尽管巴西经济增长缓慢，利率居高不下，但国内股市却一路飙升
item.description: 依赖巴西经济的股票多年来首次卷土重来，因为对货币宽松周期和明年政府可能换届的预期盖过了处于二十年高位的借贷成本和增长放缓的影响。【原文：Stocks that depend on Brazil’s economy are staging a comeback for the first time in years, as expectations of a monetary easing cycle and a potential change in government next year overshadow borrowing costs at a two-decade high and slowing growth.】

item.title: 美国新房销售意外大涨逾 20
item.description: 美国 8 月份的新房销售量出乎意料地激增，创下自 2022 年初以来的最快速度，这很可能是由于建筑商在经济不景气的情况下大幅降价并采取销售激励措施来刺激购房者。【原文：New-home sales in the US unexpectedly surged in August to the fastest pace since early 2022, likely lifted by builders’ rampant price cuts and sales incentives to motivate buyers in a jittery economy.】

item.title: 最猖獗 "的中国黑客组织以科技公司和律师事务所为攻击目标
item.description: 据 Alphabet 公司旗下的谷歌公司称，疑似中国黑客是针对美国科技公司和法律公司的持续网络间谍活动的幕后黑手，他们经常在未被发现的情况下窃取国家安全机密。【原文：Suspected Chinese hackers are behind an ongoing cyber-espionage campaign against US technology companies and legal firms, stealing national security secrets often while remaining undetected, according to Alphabet Inc.’s Google.】

item.title: 沃尔玛印度支付应用 PhonePe 申请 15 亿美元 IPO
item.description: 由沃尔玛公司支持的印度最大数字支付提供商 PhonePe Ltd.，已通过保密途径提交了首次公开募股的初步文件，募集资金可能高达 15 亿美元，该金融科技公司的估值约为 150 亿美元。【原文：Walmart Inc.-backed PhonePe Ltd., India’s largest digital payments provider, has filed preliminary documents through the confidential route for an initial public offer, which may raise as much as $1.5 billion and value the fintech company at about $15 billion.】

item.title: 里克-佩里的能源房地产投资信托公司费米寻求最高 5.5 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 由美国前能源部长里克-佩里（Rick Perry）共同创办的房地产投资信托公司费米公司（Fermi Inc.【原文：Fermi Inc., a real estate investment trust co-founded by former US Secretary of Energy Rick Perry, is planning to raise as much as $550 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴人工智能支出推动科技股上涨，美国股市重拾涨势
item.description: 美国股市周三上扬，人工智能领域支出的新承诺帮助股指反弹重回正轨。【原文：US stocks advanced on Wednesday, with renewed pledges of spending in artificial intelligence helping put the rally in gauges back on track.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利表示将进一步降息，消费者持谨慎态度
item.description: 英格兰银行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）警告说，英国人正在减少外出就餐和购物的次数，同时他重申，央行在降息方面还有更多的路要走。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey warned that Britons are dining out and shopping less, as he reiterated that the central bank has further to go on interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 华尔街将股市对加密货币的炒作纳入新 ETF
item.description: 首先出现的是数字资产国债（digital-asset treasuries —）；上市公司募集资金，购买加密货币，然后看着股价飙升。这是一种金融炼金术：利用股市购买代币，然后让市场奖励你持有代币。【原文：First came the digital-asset treasuries — public companies that raised equity, bought crypto and watched their stock prices soar. It was a kind of financial alchemy: tap the stock market to buy tokens, then let the market reward you for holding them.】

item.title: 凯茜-伍德说，得益于人工智能，方舟可以减少新员工数量
item.description: 这家颠覆性技术投资者的创始人凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）表示，人工智能的发展意味着基金管理公司方舟投资管理有限责任公司（Ark Investment Management LLC）可以用更少的人力来完成招聘工作。【原文：Developments in artificial intelligence mean fund manager Ark Investment Management LLC can get by with fewer human recruits, the disruptive technology investor’s founder Cathie Wood said.】

item.title: 伊拉克库尔德斯坦和外国石油公司同意恢复出口
item.description: 伊拉克库尔德斯坦地区和在该地区运营的大多数石油公司签署了一项恢复原油出口的协议，但仍需联邦政府的批准，这让市场观察家们希望明确何时可以发货。【原文：Iraq’s Kurdistan region and most oil firms operating in the area signed a deal to resume crude exports, but still need the federal government’s go-ahead, leaving market-watchers looking for clarity on when shipments might flow.】

item.title: 俄罗斯炼油厂遭袭，柴油贸易商押注价格飙升
item.description: 由于乌克兰对俄罗斯燃料制造商的攻击升级有可能导致全球供应紧张，石油交易商正押注柴油市场的飙升。【原文：Oil traders are betting on a surging diesel market as an escalation in Ukrainian attacks on Russian fuelmakers threatens to tighten global supply.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德支持的天然气 IPO 将激励更多加拿大交易
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）支持的一家能源行业公司有望在多伦多上市，这引发了海湾街的乐观情绪，认为该国的养老基金和资产管理公司已准备好开始让更多的投资组合公司上市。【原文：The prospect of a Toronto IPO for a Brookfield Asset Management-backed energy-sector company is sparking optimism on Bay Street that the country’s pension funds and asset managers are ready to start taking more portfolio companies public.】

item.title: 据说雀巢将邀请摩根士丹利进行维生素业务审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，雀巢公司已指定摩根士丹利对其维生素业务进行战略审查，这家全球最大的食品公司正寻求恢复增长。【原文：Nestle SA has appointed Morgan Stanley for a strategic review of its vitamin business, according to people familiar with the matter, as the world’s largest food company looks to revive growth.】

item.title: 加拿大人口增长率因限制移民而接近于零
item.description: 加拿大移民驱动的人口增长曾经是一列失控的列车，如今却嘎然而止。【原文：Once a runaway train, Canada’s immigration-driven population growth has come to a grinding halt.】

item.title: 习近平敦促新疆以稳定和治理为重点促进增长
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁新疆地方政府全力维护社会稳定，加强治理，以推进自治区的发展。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping called on Xinjiang’s local government to make every effort to maintain social stability and strengthen governance, aiming to advance the autonomous region’s development.】

item.title: 里海石油管道运营商报告俄罗斯办事处遭无人机破坏
item.description: 负责哈萨克斯坦大部分原油通过俄罗斯出口到黑海的里海管道财团称，其位于新罗西斯克的办事处在一次无人机袭击中受损。【原文：The Caspian Pipeline Consortium, which handles most of Kazakhstan’s crude exports through Russia to the Black Sea, said its office in Novorossiysk was damaged in a drone strike.】

item.title: 破产企业 Northvolt 受托人称董事会不太可能承担责任
item.description: 倒闭的瑞典电池制造商 Northvolt AB 旗下一家公司的受托人表示，要求董事会董事个人承担责任的依据不足，尽管供应商提出的约 68 亿克朗（约合 7.2 亿美元）索赔仍未支付。【原文：The trustee for a unit of failed Swedish battery maker Northvolt AB said there is little basis to hold board directors personally liable, even as supplier claims of about 6.8 billion kronor ($720 million) remain unpaid.】

item.title: 安联全球首席信息官警告：人工智能可能使上市公司缩水 20
item.description: 安联全球投资公司（Allianz Global Investors）全球股票业务首席投资官表示，人工智能将迎来一个 "数字达尔文主义 "时期，这对未能适应这一时代的公司来说将是 "非常、非常残酷的"。【原文：Artificial intelligence will usher in a period of “digital Darwinism” that will be “very, very brutal” for companies that fail to adapt, according to the chief investment officer of Allianz Global Investors’ global equities business.】

item.title: 可可反弹，诱人价格吸引豆类买家
item.description: 可可期货在纽约和伦敦止跌回升，原因是商业买盘抵消了供应前景改善和欧盟森林砍伐法规可能推迟实施所带来的压力。【原文：Cocoa futures snapped declines in New York and London as commercial buying offsets pressure from better supply prospects and a possible delay to the European Union Deforestation Regulation.】

item.title: 自由港宣布 Grasberg 项目不可抗力，铜价跳涨
item.description: 在自由港麦克莫兰公司（Freeport McMoRan Inc.【原文：Copper prices jumped Wednesday after Freeport McMoRan Inc. said force majeure was declared on contracted supplies from its giant Grasberg mine in Indonesia.】

item.title: 捷克因价格风险暂缓加息，焦点转向未来之路
item.description: 捷克中央银行在第三次会议上维持利率不变，此前决策者对持续存在的通胀风险表示担忧。【原文：The Czech central bank left interest rates unchanged for a third meeting after policymakers expressed concerns over persistent inflation risks.】

item.title: Novacap 同意以 19 亿美元收购 Integral Ad Science
item.description: Novacap 同意收购 Integral Ad Science Holding Corp.，该交易对这家广告分析公司的估值约为 19 亿美元。【原文：Novacap has agreed to acquire Integral Ad Science Holding Corp. in a deal that values the advertising analytics company at about $1.9 billion.】

item.title: 甲骨文寻求通过公司债券销售融资 150 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，甲骨文公司本周三正寻求从美国投资级债券市场借款 150 亿美元。【原文：Oracle Corp. is seeking to borrow $15 billion from the US investment-grade bond market on Wednesday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀率在墨西哥银行关键利率会议召开前有所加快
item.description: 在墨西哥央行周四做出利率决定之前，墨西哥 9 月初的年度通胀加速度基本符合预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation accelerated roughly in line with expectations in early September ahead of the central bank’s Thursday interest rate decision.】

item.title: 贝森特称美国正在与阿根廷谈判 200 亿美元的交换额度
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，美国正在与阿根廷讨论 200 亿美元的互换额度，并准备购买该国的美元债券，这将为哈维尔-米莱总统在下月关键的中期选举之前 "架起一座桥梁"。【原文：The US is discussing a $20 billion swap line with Argentina and is ready to buy up the country’s dollar bonds, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said, giving President Javier Milei “a bridge” until key midterm elections next month.】

item.title: 野村的麦克利戈特说，股市欣喜若狂，应继续对冲
item.description: 野村证券国际公司（Nomura Securities International Inc.【原文：Bullish investors should keep hedging their portfolios as more and more people chase this year’s stock market rally, according to Nomura Securities International Inc. cross-asset strategist Charlie McElligott.】
